subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] i just joined
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
I saw a very good test done once on tv and it was shocking to me.  The person had 2 cameras at a location, a 35mm and a digital.

They took several pictures at the same time side by side, the digital had several "Orbs" and the 35mm caught no anomaly's at all in any of the pictures.

I believe what could be called an "Orb" for the most part can be debunked quickly as dust, rain, bugs....etc

At least 99 percent anyway.  I think we have more luck in the field using different types of audio for evidence.

Just my thoughts

-Steve



Sent from my iPhone

On Sep 24, 2012, at 10:55 AM, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...> wrote:

> One photo has multiple "orbs" - this indicates it is most likely dust particle reflections. The other one, probably dust, too. Did you take multiple photos from the exact same spot to compare?
